programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Heng basks in the newfound popularity of his Kungfu Sinseh character. Damien continues to suspect that Sarah was the one responsible for scamming him. Alex and Rose deal with the sudden death of their friend.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Hire Me Please!
programme.desc: (Encore) In Singapore, the ancient art of effigy making is facing demise, as skilled artisans retire. What would we lose when that time comes, and what can we do to preserve this heritage?

programme.title: Unnatural S3
programme.desc: Claire, a young woman who's always been teased for being flat-chested, goes for breast argumentation. Unfortunately complications arise post surgery and kills her. On his 50th birthday, Donovan goes for cosmetic surgery to improve his looks and physical shape in order to keep up with his beautiful and much younger wife. In an ironic twist, the surgery kills him instead.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Mazed and Confused, Dirty Laundry, Say What and more for the chance to win a cash prize; Meghan Trainor joins Ellen to play Knockin' Boots.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S2
programme.desc: Revealing archives and real footages of the meteorological phenomena, witness some of the most deadly natural disasters the planet has ever seen.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club S8b
programme.desc: Jamie and Jimmy are back on Southend Pier in their seaside cafe, welcoming more celebrities to the cooking lesson of a lifetime. Tracking down special recipes that really mean something to each of their guests, Jamie takes them on a personal journey using the power of food. The boys have also been busy travelling around the UK, visiting social enterprises that use catering skills to help the homeless; putting in a shift with the RAF catering division and learning how to make artisanal chocolate.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: The Nile is the world's longest river. From elephants and leopards, to extreme kayakers and ancient wonders, its great length is a lifeline for astonishing wildlife and cultures.

programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.desc: Sloppy and Imp both want the latest limited-edition Falcon Fly sneakers. Seeing this, Poly-GON manipulates them into competing with each other for the shoes. They get so distracted hunting for the sneakers that they neglect their Squad rescue mission. It's a pretty big job for these small pets, but this paw-some team is certified and ready for action!

Then one day, the music stopped. Cambodia found itself in a civil war under the communist Pol Pot Regime. About a third of its population was murdered. Musicians, artists, and the educated were targeted as the Regime perceived them to have western values.
